Class RendererCommon.VideoLayoutMeasure

java.lang.Object
com.telnyx.webrtc.lib.RendererCommon.VideoLayoutMeasure
Enclosing class:
RendererCommon
public static class RendererCommon.VideoLayoutMeasure extends Object
Helper class for determining layout size based on layout requirements, scaling type, and video aspect ratio.
